Uses of Class
org.jcvi.jillion.core.Range.Builder

  • Packages that use Range.Builder 
    Package Description
    org.jcvi.jillion.core
    The Jillion Core package contains common genomic objects that are useful to all genomic investigations.

    • Uses of Range.Builder in org.jcvi.jillion.core

      Methods in org.jcvi.jillion.core that return Range.Builder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Range.Builder Range.Builder.contractBegin(long units)
      Shrink the begin value by the given amount of units.
      Range.Builder Range.Builder.contractEnd(long units)
      Shrink the end value by the given amount of units.
      Range.Builder Range.Builder.copy()
      Create a copy of this Builder using the current values.
      Range.Builder Range.Builder.expandBegin(long units)
      Grows the begin value by the given amount of units.
      Range.Builder Range.Builder.expandEnd(long units)
      Grows the end value by the given amount of units.
      Range.Builder Range.Builder.intersect(Range.Builder other)
      Intersect the current begin and end coordinates with another Range, the resulting intersection coordinates are now this Builder's begin and end.
      Range.Builder Range.Builder.intersect(Range other)
      Intersect the current begin and end coordinates with another Range, the resulting intersection coordinates are now this Builder's begin and end.
      Range.Builder Range.Builder.setBegin(long begin)
      Explicitly set the begin value in 0-based coordinate system.
      Range.Builder Range.Builder.setEnd(long end)
      Explicitly set the end value in 0-based coordinate system.
      Range.Builder Range.Builder.shift(long units)
      Shift the entire range by the given amount of units.
      Range.Builder Range.toBuilder()
      Create a new Range.Builder instance initialized to this Range's values.
